title: I have a Samsung galaxy tab A 10.4 andriod 10, it iscoming up as a pixel phone? Plus Linux?
content:
Even selecting help the options made me choose pixel phone?
As stated it is a Samsung galaxy Tab  A7 10.4 using android's
What is concerning is that my Google account says a device 
Signed into my account using A Linux device,  is Android 10 supported by Linux
Or is this a security breach from my new Tab A7?
Please help ASAP
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
